column3: Traffic Advisory for I-75S at the 119 MM:
column4: The rightmost lane (the exit ramp lane for I-64W) is blocked as crews continue clean up of an earlier semi fire.

column3: Traffic Advisory for New Circle Rd at Eastland Pkwy:
column4: The inner loop left lane is blocked, and the outer loop left lane and turn lane are blocked due to Police activity.

Inbound Midland Ave between E Short St and E Main St
